title: (x) Font from the movie "up in the air"????? - (similar to) H&FJ Gotham (outlined) {Seb}
content:
PLEASE can anybody help me figure out this particular font??? The closest I've found is Drescher Grotesk or Century Gothic, but cant figure the outline(the outline is key!)  
I'd be incredibly greatful.

Cheers.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120103163019im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_4077.jpg)
author: happysteinberg

comments.content: Looks like an outlined Gotham to me.
